overview:
Brian is a successful Tech industry entrepreneur with over 15+ years experience spanning from co-founder & President of a software start-up to Worldwide Sales & Partner Relations roles with Enterprise ISV’s and Industry Analyst.

Over the years he has helped build successful companies with on-premise and Software as a Service delivery models focused around the IT Enterprise including Datacenter Management, Information Security, Application & Database Lifecycle Management, Business Intelligence, Analytics and Global Manufacturing applications.

Brian is active in the Austin Technology Community, an Advisor to other entrepreneurs & start-ups, has connections within Fortune 500 Global IT Enterprises to Venture Capital and Angel investors and likes to meet people passionate about start-ups, early-stage investing & the latest technologies.
